name: Crazy Cats (KThekat)
description:
Who would have thought that acceding to take care of a little abandoned cat would end up with lots and lots of street cats coming daily to your shelter?

As the owner of it, you'll have to take care of all the cats that come to it by satisfying their necessities, which include giving them food, showering them, giving them a place to sleep and playing with them!

Controls:

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move

Use the mouse buttons to interact with the cats

Credits:

KtheKat - Programming & Desing

Nalie Miller - Art

Music from:

Funny Cartoons by Free Music | https://soundcloud.com/fm_freemusic

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
